text: Amanda Leigh Moore, known as Mandy Moore (born April 10, 1984) is an American actress and pop singer-songwriter. She was born in Nashua, New Hampshire and grew up in Longwood, Florida, outside of Orlando. She has been active since the late 1990s. She is known for the voice of Sheriff Callie in Sheriff Callie's Wild West, Bingo in Rivit Monsters, Polana in Trolls: The Beat Goes On! and Trolls: TrollsTopia and Courtney in the Family Guy episode No Giggity, No Doubt, Rapunzel in Sofia the First and Tangled: The Series, Mara in Tron: Uprising, Tabitha Vixx in The Simpsons. Moore is also a cast member of the 2016 American dramedy series This Is Us. And she's also the Theme song singer of: Sheriff Callie's Wild West. ==Discography== Studio albums * So Real (1999) * Mandy Moore (2001) * Coverage (2003) * Wild Hope (2007) * Amanda Leigh (2009) * Silver Landings (2020) * In Real Life (2022) ==Filmography== | 2014-2017 | Sheriff Callie's Wild West | Sheriff Callie and the Theme song singer | Television series |} ==References== == Other websites == * Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Florida Category:Actors from New Hampshire Category:American child actors Category:American child singers Category:American movie actors Category:American pop musicians Category:American singer-songwriters Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Musicians from Florida Category:Musicians from New Hampshire Category:Singers from Florida Category:Singers from New Hampshire
title: Mandy Moore
